name: CITYSOON - Bowditch version #4
description:
Urban design with physic.
A generated GIF loop coded by Pizza Punk (Jerome Mercier - twitter @GenerativePunk), France.
September 2021

Position of 96 blocks guided by a sinusoidal fonction with modulators (Lissajous or Bowditch curves).
Steps : 5
Factor x : 32
Factor y : 9
